structure.unit: ARTICLE II. MIAMI-DADE FIRE AND RESCUE SERVICE DISTRICT

text.section:
Sec. 18-25. Boundaries.
The initial boundaries of the District shall be the geographic boundaries of Miami-Dade County, excluding any municipality which opted out of the Metro-Dade Fire and Rescue Service District created by Ordinance No. 80-86 prior to the date this article was adopted.
